page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: Since Eastwood lies within the green belt area round Glasgow ,there are many recreational and sporting facilities avaliable ,both public and private .There are private golf courses ,namely Cathcart Castle and the Whitecraigs golf club and a public course at Deaconsbank . Roukenglen Park and Eastwood Park provide opportunities for swimming ,boating and walking ,as well as being very attractive and picturesque in themselves . Most other outdoor sports such as football ,hockey and rugby are well catered for either with the private sector or the public sector . There is also the theatre in Eastwood Park which stages performances by many local amateur dramatic groups .
